text: Kate Quilton is a television presenter best known for her work on food shows like Food Unwrapped. Quilton began working in television while still a student. She had jobs with ITV and the BBC. She made programmes for Channel 4 from 2010 until 2014 including the short lived documentary series Seven Days. She resigned from Channel 4 in 2014 to work full time on Food Unwrapped. In 2014 Quilton appeared with Food Unwrapped co-presenter Jimmy Doherty in The World's Best Diet, a one-off show. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Living people Category:1983 births Category:Channel 4 presenters Category:English television presenters
title: Kate Quilton
